name: Shopping Cart Diagnostics
tag_list: website-error, store-troubleshooting, check-store, magento-error, magento-testing, checkup
description: Shopping Cart Diagnostics is a one-of-it
overview:
Shopping Cart Diagnostics is an innovative service that allows to troubleshoot your online store for all kinds of errors. It is developed to identify an error, inform you about it and provide you with a productive solution. The service supports 9 popular shopping carts among which are Magento, PrestaShop, VirtueMart and other major ecommerce solutions. The number of supported platforms is constantly growing. The procedure of error analysis is performed online, so no software installation is required. You can even start testing your store without any registrations or payments: just enter its URL address. Shopping Cart Diagnostics provides a variety of useful features:

  • user experience monitoring,
  • analysis of web site functioning in terms of security, server environment, store configurations,
  • content check up
  • website SEO analysis. The Integrated approach allows you to perform complex check of the store for any kind of inaccuracies using only one solution. With Shopping Cart Diagnostics you will be sure of your store accurate and effective functioning.

offices.address2: USA,  2801 Camino Del Rio S, Suite 302, San Diego, CA 92117
